products.name: Hanes Men's EcoSmart Fleece, Pullover Crewneck Sweatshirt, 1 or 2 Pack
products.category_path: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > › > Men > › > Clothing > › > Active > › > Active Sweatshirts

product_details.description: Hanes® EcoSmart® men's fleece sweatshirt is sure to become your new go-to wardrobe staple. Soft and plush, this cozy pullover sweatshirt is made from a midweight blend featuring cotton sourced from American farms. A classic crewneck style, this pullover is sturdy and made to keep its plush comfort for a long time. The fleece design is built to hold its shape thanks to a ribbed crewneck, cuffs, and hem. Double-needle stitching at the neck and armholes further enhance the quality and sturdiness. Pair this Hanes crewneck sweatshirt with everything from jeans to sweats for a laid-back look.

about_this_item: Real Feedback5.0 out of 5 starsSuper soft, cozy & flatteringReviewed in the United States on October 30, 2025Color: Brown PlaidSize: MediumVerified PurchaseVery soft with well woven, good quality material. Warm enough for windy/brisk fall days but breathable. Roomy enough to layer underneath for colder weather. I slept in it and I was comfortable all night. Colors are vibrant & I love the hood for windy days or extra warmth (it’s light weight so it doesn’t pull on front of neck.) I sized up to have a little extra room, but it’s still flattering. I wish it had front pockets, but that’s not a dealbreaker because it’s so comfortable. I highly recommend and will be ordering more in different colors.Read moreReal Feedback5.0 out of 5 starsSuper soft, cozy & flatteringReviewed in the United States on October 30, 2025Very soft with well woven, good quality material. products.name: Hanes Men's Jersey Pocket Short
products.category_path: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > › > Men > › > Clothing > › > Active > › > Active Shorts

product_details.description: It's no wonder these cotton jersey shorts from Hanes® for men are bestsellers. These ultra-versatile knit shorts are just the thing to slip into after work, to wear to the gym, to relax in on movie night, or even to wear to bed. Simply styled, they pull right on, with an elasticized waist and adjustable interior drawstring. Handy side pockets hold keys and other essentials. These pull-on lounge shorts are a mid-thigh length with a 7.5" inseam. We suggest having several pairs of these comfortable cotton jersey shorts on hand. You'll wear them again and again.
